少不了.definition: cannot do without; to be unavoidable; are bound to be many

少不得.definition: cannot be avoided; cannot do without

少不更事.definition: (idiom) young and inexperienced; wet behind the ears

少來.definition: refrain (from doing sth); (coll.) Come on!; Give me a break!; Save it!

少先隊.definition: Young Pioneers of China, abbr. for 少年先鋒隊|少年先锋队[Shao4 nian2 Xian1 feng1 dui4]

少塊肉.definition: (coll.) (usually used in the negative) (can't) hurt (to do sth); (won't) hurt (to do sth)

少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲.pinyin: shao4 zhuang4 bu4 nu3 li4 , lao3 da4 tu2 shang1 bei1
少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲.definition: if you are lazy in your prime, you'll be sorry in your old age

少壯派.definition: young guard; young and vigorous group with new ideas; new wave

少奶奶.definition: young lady of the house; wife of the young master

少子化.definition: declining birthrate (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 少子化 "shoushika")

少安毋躁.definition: keep calm, don't get excited; don't be impatient

少安無躁.definition: variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]

少將.definition: major general; rear admiral; air vice marshal

少年.definition: early youth; youngster; (literary) youth; young man

少年先鋒隊.definition: Young Pioneers of China (primary school league, a preparation for Communist Youth League); abbr. to 少先隊|少先队

少年夫妻老來伴.pinyin: shao4 nian2 fu1 qi1 lao3 lai2 ban4
少年夫妻老來伴.definition: husband and wife in youth, companions in old age

少年宮.definition: Children's Palace, institution where children can take part in various extracurricular activities

少年老成.definition: accomplished though young; lacking youthful vigor

少府.definition: Minor Treasurer in imperial China, one of the Nine Ministers 九卿[jiu3 qing1]

少放.definition: to add less (of a spice etc)

少數民族鄉.definition: ethnic township (formal village level subdivision of PRC county)

少東.definition: boss's son; young master; young boss

少林.definition: the Shaolin monastery and martial arts school

少林寺.definition: Shaolin Temple, Buddhist monastery famous for its kung fu monks

少校.definition: junior ranking officer in Chinese army; major; lieutenant commander

少爺.definition: son of the boss; young master of the house; your son (honorific)

少管閒事.definition: Mind your own business!; Don't interfere!

少見.definition: rare; seldom seen; (formal) it's a rare pleasure to see you

少見多怪.definition: lit. a person who has seen little of the world will be be astonished by certain things (idiom); fig. to be taken aback by sth because of one's lack of sophistication; naive; unworldy

少說為佳.definition: Few words are best.; Brevity is the soul of wit.

少部分.definition: a small proportion of; Taiwan pr. [shao3bu4fen4]

少量.definition: a smidgen; a little bit; a few

少間.definition: soon; a short while; a narrow gap; slightly better (state of health)

少陽經.definition: lesser yang gallbladder meridian of the leg (one of the 12 principal meridians of TCM)
